name: $home
desc: The patient was discharged and has indicated that they are going to return home afterwards, but not the patient's home - e.g. a family member's home.

name: $alt-home
desc: The patient was transferred to another healthcare facility.

name: $other-hcf
desc: The patient has been discharged into palliative care.

name: $hosp
desc: The patient has been discharged into long-term care where is likely to be monitored through an ongoing episode-of-care.

name: $long
desc: The patient self discharged against medical advice.

name: $aadvice
desc: The patient has deceased during this encounter.

name: $exp
desc: The patient has been transferred to a psychiatric facility.

name: $psy
desc: The patient was discharged and is to receive post acute care rehabilitation services.

name: $rehab
desc: The patient has been discharged to a skilled nursing facility for the patient to receive additional care.

name: $snf
desc: The discharge disposition has not otherwise defined.
